name: linda
innate: resilient and unyielding, still trying to maintain the integrity of the family despite facing numerous difficulties.
learned: learned how to manage household finances and resources more effectively in adversity, and worked hard to support the family.
currently: linda lives together with his husband chris gardner. and his son christopher gardner II. experienced financial hardships with chris, and despite the tough living conditions, still tried to maintain the stability of the family.
lifestyle: linda goes to bed around midnight, awakes up around 5am, eats dinner around 6pm.
